name: Yalmaha Tuning

items.alias: Auto Paint v. 303 - XL Gold Flash

raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ a Yalmaha ( ie : #L "Yalmaha XL - 29478" "117322" ) a Auto Paint ( ie : #L "Auto Paint v. 303 - XL Gold Flash" "204205" ) ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Auto Paint + Yalmaha XL - 29478 = Painted Yalmaha ( ie : #L "Yalmaha XL Gold Flash - 29478" "203292" ) Skills: | ME,CL | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ You can remove paint by using a #L "Auto Paint - Adaga Paint Remover" "207719" (in theory), but apparently it doesnt work with all the painted yalms.. like Gold Flash for example.
